thread.title: Update link in our 502 error page
thread.body:
Change in Documentation structure so please change                                                                                                                                          
from< https://codio.com/docs/boxes/access/ext-access/ > https://codio.com/docs/boxes/access/ext-access/                                                                                     
to                                                                                                                                                                                          
< https://codio.com/docs/ide/boxes/access/ext-access/ >https://codio.com/docs/ide/boxes/access/ext-access/                                                                                  
 < https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/user/ijobling >Ian Jobling What page do you mean? Can't find this page or this link on client and dashboard. Can you provide a screenshot of this page?
